languages.text: Иако примеряет на себя личину священника и умело плетет воодушевляющую ложь о праведности страданий. Люди со слезами радости возвращаются к опасному труду, продолжая вдыхать ядовитые прометиумные пары.

Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.
languages.original_text: Иако примеряет на себя личину священника и умело плетет воодушевляющую ложь о праведности страданий. Люди со слезами радости возвращаются к опасному труду, продолжая вдыхать ядовитые прометиумные пары.

Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

languages.text: Disfrazado de predicador, Sotniy teje una red artística e inspiradora de mentiras sobre la nobleza del sufrimiento. Con lágrimas de felicidad en los ojos, la gente vuelve a su peligroso trabajo, inhalando una vez más los humos tóxicos del prometio.
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

traits.locale_text: Disfrazado de predicador, Sotniy teje una red artística e inspiradora de mentiras sobre la nobleza del sufrimiento. Con lágrimas de felicidad en los ojos, la gente vuelve a su peligroso trabajo, inhalando una vez más los humos tóxicos del prometio.

languages.text: プリーチャーを装ったソトニーは、苦しみが正しいものであると、芸術的かつ感動的な嘘の網を紡いでいく。喜びの涙を流しながら、人々はプロメチウムの煙を吸い込むような危険な仕事へと戻っていく。
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

traits.locale_text: プリーチャーを装ったソトニーは、苦しみが正しいものであると、芸術的かつ感動的な嘘の網を紡いでいく。喜びの涙を流しながら、人々はプロメチウムの煙を吸い込むような危険な仕事へと戻っていく。

languages.text: 索蒂尼伪装成了布道士，编织了一张言辞巧妙、鼓舞人心的谎言之网，讲述了苦难的正义性。工人们听得热泪盈眶，再次投身于危险的工作之中，呼吸起了有毒的钷素烟雾。
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

traits.locale_text: 索蒂尼伪装成了布道士，编织了一张言辞巧妙、鼓舞人心的谎言之网，讲述了苦难的正义性。工人们听得热泪盈眶，再次投身于危险的工作之中，呼吸起了有毒的钷素烟雾。

languages.text: Als Priester verkleidet webt Sotniy ein kunstvolles und inspirierendes Netz aus Lügen über die Rechtschaffenheit des Leids. Mit Freudentränen in den Augen nehmen die Leute ihre gefährliche Arbeit wieder auf und atmen wieder die giftigen Promethium-Dämpfe ein.
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

traits.locale_text: Als Priester verkleidet webt Sotniy ein kunstvolles und inspirierendes Netz aus Lügen über die Rechtschaffenheit des Leids. Mit Freudentränen in den Augen nehmen die Leute ihre gefährliche Arbeit wieder auf und atmen wieder die giftigen Promethium-Dämpfe ein.

languages.text: Déguisé en prédicateur, Sotniy profère un tissu de mensonges aussi inspiré que convaincant sur la vertu de la souffrance. Les yeux baignés de larmes de joie, les ouvriers retournent à leur poste au mépris du danger, s'exposant à nouveau aux vapeurs toxiques du prométhium.
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.

traits.locale_text: Déguisé en prédicateur, Sotniy profère un tissu de mensonges aussi inspiré que convaincant sur la vertu de la souffrance. Les yeux baignés de larmes de joie, les ouvriers retournent à leur poste au mépris du danger, s'exposant à nouveau aux vapeurs toxiques du prométhium.

languages.text: Vaiz kılığına girmiş Sotniy, acı çekmenin erdemliliğine dair sanatsal ve ilham verici bir yalan ağı örüyor. Gözlerinden mutluluk gözyaşları dökülen insanlar, zehirli prometyum buharlarını bir kez daha ciğerlerine çekerek tehlikeli işlerine geri dönüyor.
languages.original_text: Disguised as a preacher, Sotniy spins an artful and inspiring web of lies about the righteousness of suffering. With tears of joy in their eyes, the people return to their dangerous work, once more breathing the toxic promethium fumes.
